website_summaries.verdict: A classic snow boot designed to be waterproof and warm from bottom to top.
pros: Keeps feet warm and dry in the snow
No tie closure on the front - easy for kids to use
cons: There is a lot of lining in these boots, which may make them seem to run a little small

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: These boots look really nice but they don't hold up at all. After two weeks of wear the bungee that keeps them snug was almost worn through and some of the loops that the bungee runs through had come off. The bottom part of the boot works fine and my son really liked them but they were not worth the price. I put in a return request and it went through without any difficulty. I thought maybe it was just this pair but the size 4 that I bought for my younger son is doing the same thing and I just haven't gone to the effort to return them yet.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Breegh

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BOOT FOR A REASONABLE PRICE
customer_reviews.text: These boots look great and fit my son very well. They really look durable with top quality materials with a reasonable price. We just received the boots, so I cannot comment on the longevity of the footwear, but I will update this rating if they fall apart soon.
customer_reviews.author: Z. J. Garcia

customer_reviews.title: great deal, assuming they don't fall apart
customer_reviews.text: very cute and seem to be very warm. But also quite snug with all the padding. I ordered a 1/2 size bigger than what my son normally wears... but probably should have ordered a full size larger. Haven't tested their durability or water resistance yet but will update if necessary! Hopefully a great deal for the price
customer_reviews.author: Mommy, PhD.

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: The boots were a reasonable price and looked like a good solid boot. The downside being my 7 year old would come home every day with his feet soaked and the insoles rotted in less than a month of wearing them. This boot is not at all waterproof. The leather side material would saturate with water and soak through.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Enockson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very comfortable and durable. my child tends to really wear out his boots--these are really holding up!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Boots were purchased for my autistic son, who has previously had many issues with other winter boots and the lining. These boots work great for him, and he wears them without complaint. My only wish is that they came with shoe strings that tie, instead of the pull tab. He likes his shoes laced pretty tight, and at times he struggles to get these just right without the pull tab loosening. Otherwise, I would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Zuppa

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase and worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and warm! My son loves these and says they're soft and warm. Easy for kids to put on and tighten as well. They are on the heavier side but it's expected with the quality. It arrived EXTREMELY early also! It was scheduled for a Thursday and came Monday before New Year's Eve! Extremely impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Barbie_Girl

customer_reviews.title: The first time he tried them on he said they were comfortable. He has only wore them a few times ...
customer_reviews.text: My son is really picky about how his shoes and boots fit and I have not heard any complaints about these. The first time he tried them on he said they were comfortable. He has only wore them a few times so I'm not sure how they will hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They look to be great boots for the cost
customer_reviews.text: These boots arrived yesterday. They look to be great boots for the cost. They appear well made and my son was very happy with the color and style. The quality is great for the cost. Totes did a great job with these boots.
customer_reviews.author: David Maughan

customer_reviews.title: Good for a season
customer_reviews.text: These were decent for the season, and the outsides were sturdy and great protection from the weather, but the inside lining fell apart REALLY rapidly and we ended up having to pitch them at the end of just one winter. My son's previous Walmart winter boots' lining held up for almost 2 years and I paid way less.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ordered a size up for room to grow and extra thick socks and they didn't end up having as much extra room as it seems like they
customer_reviews.text: Runs a little small. Ordered a size up for room to grow and extra thick socks and they didn't end up having as much extra room as it seems like they should have. Otherwise a great boot. They've seen hours of play in the snow already and feet are warm and dry.
customer_reviews.author: Jason C.

customer_reviews.title: The best out there
customer_reviews.text: These boots are awesome. Not only can my 7 year old son put them in by himself with the bungee laces, but they are a boot that looks good with regular clothes (not just snow gear.). They are also really good quality.
customer_reviews.author: J. Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Amazing deal!
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing boots for the price! They fit perfect and he wears them daily! No wear and tear and keep his feet nice and warm
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Great Boot
customer_reviews.text: These boots are great for my 5 year old who isn't so good at tying laces yet. These are his school boots, so the teacher doesn't have to tie them for him. They fit perfectly and seem quite durable.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Slater

customer_reviews.title: Won’t keep your kid’s feet dry
customer_reviews.text: Not at all what i expected out of a snow boot. They probably would have kept my son’s feet warm enough, but the first time he wore them in the snow to play, his feet were soaking wet within 5 minutes. I’m so mad that I kept these boots instead of one If the other ones I had my son try on. As a note - the liner in these boots is not removeable. So if they get wet inside, they stay wet for a looooong time. Gross.
customer_reviews.author: M.Daly

customer_reviews.title: These are good, live in NH
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my boys, they love them. The boots are warm in NH winter and they are holding up pretty good after a year.
customer_reviews.author: Nielsens

customer_reviews.title: Good so far...
customer_reviews.text: I brought this precisely for the snow. I ordered a size bigger after reading the reviews. They seem to be good, my son spent about an hour playing and laying in about 1-2 feet if snow. While his pants were drenched and his legs quite cold, when he took the boots off his feet were warm and cozy. We shall see how the rest if winter and snow go....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I like these. My son says they are very comfy. They are durable and warm plus pretty cute.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Petty

customer_reviews.title: Rugged like boot
customer_reviews.text: Good boots. Living in a snowy climate...kiddo has to stay dry. These are waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Tori McGuire

customer_reviews.title: Great looking boot.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a 2, he wears 13.5 shoe now. They're a bit roomy even with doubled up socks. Going to keep in case his feet grow overnight (again).
customer_reviews.author: Jillian

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed but overall, a great boot.
customer_reviews.text: Loved the boot itself but strap holding the “laces” broke off within two weeks. Given its at the top of the boot, the boot cannot close securely. My son reports the boot is warm (except when snow gets in 😞) and fits well. Bummer..
customer_reviews.author: MN Mom

customer_reviews.title: Warm, great snow boot.  Not extremely high quality, but good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Product looked good, fit well. Bought for 8 year old grandson who wore them every day for 2+ months. Didn't make it through the winter before they wore out. Overall decent product, just not for high use.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl J McCulley

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Love this boots! They keep my son's feet warm. The quality is very good. Would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: angelica

customer_reviews.title: Failed after half a year
customer_reviews.text: The boots failed after half a winter of use. They broke down way too soon.
customer_reviews.author: AK Eric

customer_reviews.title: So soft and comfy toes stay warm in 12 inches of snow!
customer_reviews.text: Great looking and feeling. Hope they hold up for awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Usathome

customer_reviews.title: boots
customer_reviews.text: great fit great service,, grandson loves them saying they are so warm
customer_reviews.author: darlene

customer_reviews.title: Son says Super comfy
customer_reviews.text: My son was super excited to wear these saying they were very comfortable. He did not want to touch his second set of boots he keeps at home.
customer_reviews.author: J. J Stoop

customer_reviews.title: Great boys boot!
customer_reviews.text: Gave as a Christmas present and he LOVED them. Warm, sturdy, great price!
customer_reviews.author: LAF

customer_reviews.title: not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Although they seem like a good snow boot, they are not waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: ShoppingNut

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks like the picture, good quality. Would certainly by again, came quickly too.
customer_reviews.author: altogetheralso

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My grandson love them. Now if it would ever snow, he could find use for these boots!!
customer_reviews.author: ahalp

customer_reviews.title: Hurting along the border where soft material meets rubber, ...
customer_reviews.text: Hurting along the border where soft material meets rubber, both boots. Son didn't complaint on short try-out but after wearing boots for 10-15 min for the first time outside. Can't even return anymore since snow didn't start until return date had past recently, now we have faulty product sitting at home. Also: difficult getting on/off because shaft is too tied and string is so short that it doesn't allow it to be loosened. Boot is heavier than other boots I bought before and after. Not recommending these boots.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 2 boys

customer_reviews.title: missing a loop.
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking, but my grandson just told me they bug him where the heel sits and the toung falls forward on one shoe. So we looked and found it was missing a loop. Can not do anything to make it better.
customer_reviews.author: Karen  Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Awesome boots for little ones
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the first snowfall. Boys went sledding and their feet were nice and cozy...and dry!
customer_reviews.author: Momoftwins71

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is a Christmas gift but I am sure the size will work.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Great boots
customer_reviews.text: Son loved how easier to put on and secure the laces
customer_reviews.author: Connie Perera

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and easy to put on.
customer_reviews.text: My son says that they are so comfortable and soft and they are easy to put on!
customer_reviews.author: cool

customer_reviews.title: Great Boots!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for the price. Color is true to picture and inside is fuzzy and warm.
customer_reviews.author: SManning

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: so far the boots seem to be a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Great boots!
customer_reviews.text: Great boots! Keep the water out and the feet warm ad dry. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Bad soles and heals
customer_reviews.text: Sole wore down in one month...have to buy new boots..not happy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Best boots I've purchased yet for my son. Lining is very comfortable, easy on and off. No laces to tie, pull cord so he can do everything himself!
customer_reviews.author: Scott Lewandowski

customer_reviews.title: So glad that I ordered 1 size bigger than I needed
customer_reviews.text: So glad that I ordered 1 size bigger than I needed. These run small. Appears to be made well but haven't tried them out yet.
customer_reviews.author: BG

customer_reviews.title: Snow tested. Son and Mom approved.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice boots at a good price. My son played in the snow yesterday. They kept his feet warm & dry. He said they are comfortable. He has wide feet. These fit true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. My boy's new favorite boots. Beautiful, worth every dollar. I love them. Thick sole, well made. I will definitely will buy them in other colors.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Louise Marie

customer_reviews.title: I'm pleased with the purchase of these boots
customer_reviews.text: Fits very well. My 9 yr old grandson said that the boots are warm and his feet have never gotten wet. I'm pleased with the purchase of these boots.
customer_reviews.author: E. Bisby

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Great item. It is 1/2 size larger which is great since my son will be wearing thick socks.
customer_reviews.author: The Buyer

customer_reviews.title: They look great and fits right
customer_reviews.text: The boots arrived on time. They look great and fits right! They look cute too!. I'm happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Judie

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This boot solved the problem of our son getting snow down into his boot. That alone earns 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: Good boots
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my grandson and he loved them, said the fit just right and his feet were warm and dry.
customer_reviews.author: Fancy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Boot! Quality and comfort and warmth is great! My grandson loved them!
customer_reviews.author: Joy Martin

customer_reviews.title: Nice boots
customer_reviews.text: Easy to get on and kept his feet dry and warm
customer_reviews.author: Dickson2782

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great boots! Fit as they should. Perfect for snowy conditions!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica_Ann

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: These boots are prefect. They fit great, they are not too heavy and they keep my son's feet warm and dry. They are really good quality too. My only regret is not buying myself a pair!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Porrovecchio

customer_reviews.title: Great great boots for the price and fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: Bought them for my 8 year-old non. He tried many snow boots at stores and they all hurt his feet! He absolutely loves them! Great great boots for the price and fast delivery!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I read a lot of reviews and many suggested to ...
customer_reviews.text: I read a lot of reviews and many suggested to go up a size and well I did and they were way too big. Other than them being way too big, my son loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Kristy Brock

customer_reviews.title: They seem like good quality
customer_reviews.text: My son loves them! They seem like good quality, he has not used them a bunch yet but they look like they will hold up!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Warm, dry feet
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these a tad large for my toddler (he wears a 10.5, I ordered an 11). I actually RECEIVED a size 13, and they fit about one size too big. This is fine, since I like to be able to layer socks inside for him, and MAYBE they'll fit next winter also. He says his feet are warm and dry and we've had a very cold and snowy winter this year. The laces loosen up enough to make it easier to put the boots on and take them off. The boots meet my expectations, and I would probably order them again.
customer_reviews.author: Just Me 123

customer_reviews.title: Totes Snow Boots
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with these boots for my son. The fit was perfect and they are made extremely well and the color looks like expected. The minute we received the box in the mail, my son was putting them on and playing outside in the 13.5 inches of snow we received the day before. Will definitely consider this brand in the future.
customer_reviews.author: kja

customer_reviews.title: They fit just liked I wanted
customer_reviews.text: They fit just liked I wanted. My son is loving them and they are holding up well. Very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Mandi

customer_reviews.title: Decent Snow Boots
customer_reviews.text: Kid seems to think they fit well and are warm when in the snow.
customer_reviews.author: Moonflower

product_meta.title: totes Boys Michael Snow Boot
product_meta.description: This fun-sized snow boot is perfect for warming your little one's feet in every kind of weather. The fuzzy lining and convenient bungee closure prevents any water, ice, or snow from sneaking into these fun little booties. Slip your kids into these stylish, colorful, and practical boots for warmth and comfort all day long!
feature_bullets: Waterproof upper to keep your feet dry and warm
Faux fur lining for added warmth
Front speed lacing system for perfect fit
Thick rubber sole to protect from the elements
Toe cap designed for long wear
